meanings.definition: The quality of being pleasant or easy to get along with.
meanings.sent1: Her agreeability made everyone enjoy working with her.
meanings.sent2: The agreeability of the team members helped them achieve their goals smoothly.
meanings.sent3: His agreeability was like a warm breeze on a sunny day.
meanings.sent4: The agreeability of the situation was like a perfectly tuned orchestra.
meanings.sent5: The agreeability of the atmosphere was so inviting that it put everyone at ease.

meanings.definition: The state of being in harmony or accordance with someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The agreeability between the two friends was evident in their laughter.
meanings.sent2: The agreeability of the colors in the painting created a sense of unity.
meanings.sent3: The agreeability of the puzzle pieces fit together perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The agreeability of the dance partners was like a graceful duet.
meanings.sent5: The agreeability of the flavors in the dish blended seamlessly to create a delicious meal.
